name: Mythic Manor
summary:
Mythic Manor is a free adult interactive visual novel game offering a new home and a new world.

Delve deep into your fantasies and experience the day-to-day life of sharing a manor with five gorgeous “mythic girls”.

Spend time and build relationships with the characters you like in currently over 70 unique character events plus special hidden events! The game is developed with Ren'Py solely by me, Jikei.​
info:
• 中文名: 神话庄园
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: ADV

  • 发行日期: 2018-02-11
